metadata.title: USN-7107-1 -- zlib vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Minizip in zlib incorrectly handled certain zip header fields. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service, or execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-7107-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  lib32z1 - 1:1.2.8.dfsg-1ubuntu1.1+esm3 lib32z1-dev - 1:1.2.8.dfsg-1ubuntu1.1+esm3 lib64z1 - 1:1.2.8.dfsg-1ubuntu1.1+esm3 lib64z1-dev - 1:1.2.8.dfsg-1ubuntu1.1+esm3 libx32z1 - 1:1.2.8.dfsg-1ubuntu1.1+esm3 libx32z1-dev - 1:1.2.8.dfsg-1ubuntu1.1+esm3 zlib-bin - 1:1.2.8.dfsg-1ubuntu1.1+esm3 zlib1g - 1:1.2.8.dfsg-1ubuntu1.1+esm3 zlib1g-dev - 1:1.2.8.dfsg-1ubuntu1.1+esm3 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
